Section.name: About ACEW
Section.description:
Arunachala College of Engineering for Women was established in year 1999. It is the first engineering college in the Kanyakumari district that was build for women. College is promoted by Thottam Madhavan Educational and Charitable Trust. College is affiliated to Anna University and is approved by AICTE
